profile:
Smith Property Renovations is a local general contractor specializing in interior renovations.

If you are looking to complete a new renovation in your home, whether it be your kitchen, bathroom or anything in between we have you covered.

We offer unparalleled expert level finishing at a competitive rate.

Specializing in bathroom renovations

Some of the other services that can be provided:
Drywall (new and repairs)
Paint
Trim (baseboards, door/window casing)
Tile/stone work
Floating floor install
Free Estimates

Licensed and insured
References available

My preferred first contact is via email with a brief description of your job and roughly where in the city the project is located.

Thank you,
             Craig Smith
name: Smith Property Renovations

profile:
General contracting services ranging from simple upgrades / repairs to complete demos & rebuilds to brand new construction. 

- Landscape Construction: Decks, Fences, Patios, Walk-ways and more.
- Kitchen and Bathroom upgrades/renovations.
- Garage packages: including concrete pads, electrical and plumbing.
- Complete Basement Developments.
- All types of flooring upgrades / installation.
- Interior and exterior painting.
- Drywall installation and repairs.
- Window & Door upgrades / replacement. 
- Custom built-ins and cabinetry. 
- CNC engraving.


Free estimates and on-time job completions.

Accepting all major credit cards, cash and cheque.

profile:
We've got all your needs covered: from residential remodels, to natural disaster
damage repairs and everything in between. Don't hesitate to ask us a question or inquire as to why a certain process has to take place. Our staff are friendly and knowledgeable because we know what it's like to be in your shoes.  We want you to know just how special you and your project are to us, so we do our very best to ensure that you and your needs always come first.  We even have a complimentary estimate where we'll come out to you!
